summary: This module implements a handler for the Yi proprietary language model. It orchestrates the full request‑response cycle: adding user messages, preparing tool specifications, preprocessing prompts, invoking the model via an OpenAI‑compatible client, parsing the model's output into an abstract syntax tree, and executing the resulting function calls.
business_intent: Enable applications to leverage the Yi LLM for automated function calling and tool usage, facilitating integration of proprietary AI capabilities into software workflows.
